type: Project administration or planning/Project monitoring and evaluation/Project impact assessment
short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for two project leaders/executives to supplement the internal capacity within DGMP Strat for the provision of task and solutions professional services.
description: The period of any resulting contract will be from date of contract award to three (3) years later, inclusive.  Any resulting contract will include an irrevocable option to extend the resulting contract term by up to two (2) additional one (1) year periods under the same conditions.
duration_in_months: All posts must be 300 days "/W" or 26 weeks in duration.
full_summary:
====================================
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title
Project Leader/Executive

## Reference and Solicitation Numbers
* Reference Number: CB-7143-71538606
* Solicitation Number: W6369-23-A061

## Publication and Tender Closing Dates
* Publication Date: July 12, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 10, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

## Description of Required Services
The Department of National Defence is seeking the services of two experienced project leaders/executives at the senior level to support the Director General Military Personnel Strategic (DGMP Strat) in providing task and solutions professional services. The project leaders/executives will be responsible for managing and delivering projects, analyzing and recommending solutions to complex problems, and providing expertise in project management and leadership. The initial contract period will be three years, with the option to extend the term for up to two additional one-year periods.

## Contracting Entity and Contact Information
* Contracting Entity: Director Services Contracting
* Contracting Entity Address: 105 Hotel de Ville, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 4H7, Canada
* Contact Person: Joanne Dubeau
* Contact Email: [joanne.dubeau@forces.gc.ca](mailto:joanne.dubeau@forces.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: (819) 661-9488

## Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
* Regions of Opportunity: Global
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

## Supporting Documents
The tender package is available for download at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7143/w6369-23-a061---npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7143/w6369-23-a061---ddp.pdf)
